output_list.reason: The 'transfer' function in the ChuCunLingAIGO contract does not prevent overflows, allowing users to set their balance to a very high value, effectively locking funds.
The 'transferFrom' function in the ChuCunLingAIGO contract does not prevent overflows, allowing users to set their balance to a very high value, effectively locking funds.
The 'approveAndCall' function in the ChuCunLingAIGO contract allows the spender to execute arbitrary code during the approval process, potentially leading to unauthorized spending.
The 'receiveApproval' function is marked as external, but it is actually internal and cannot be called externally, rendering it useless.
The 'ChuCunLingAIGO' constructor has a typo in it, which incorrectly assigns the initial supply of tokens to the contract itself instead of the owner.
